# Fearless Rage (Ex)
## Overview
*Fearless Rage (Ex)*: While raging, the barbarian is immune to the [[Shaken|shaken]] and [[Frightened|frightened]] conditions. A barbarian must be at least 12th level before selecting this rage power.

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 33
